title: Nvidia's CEO Warned Everyone Over a Decade Ago
text: Founded in 1993, The Motley Fool is a financial services company dedicated to making the world smarter, happier, and richer. Learn More In this video, I will talk about Nvidia (NVDA 0.12%), more specifically what its CEO said in 2011, how that turned out, and a look at some more recent announcements. *Stock prices used were from the trading day of Jan. 11, 2024. The video was published on Jan. 12, 2024. Neil Rozenbaum has no position in any of the stocks mentioned. The Motley Fool has positions in and recommends Nvidia.
